name: ðŸ“° Blog Post
description: Template: Individual blog post or article page with rich content and hero image. Optimized for reading experience.

fields.name: Internal Name
fields.helpText: Descriptive name for editors only. Not displayed on the website

fields.name: URL Slug

validations.message: Each blog post must have a unique URL slug

regexp.message: Use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only (e.g., 'my-blog-post')

fields.helpText: URL path for this post (e.g., 'how-to-improve-seo'). Lowercase with hyphens. Auto-appends to /blog/

fields.name: SEO Metadata

validations.message: Must link to an SEO entry

fields.helpText: Search engine optimization settings. Critical for blog discoverability in search results

fields.name: Article Title (H1)
fields.helpText: Main article heading. Displayed prominently at top of post. Can differ from SEO title

fields.name: Article Summary
fields.helpText: Brief article summary shown in listings and below title. Max 300 characters

fields.name: Category

validations.message: Select from: Technology, Lifestyle, Business, Design, Updates, or News

fields.helpText: Article category for organization and filtering. Displayed as a badge on the post

fields.name: Publish Date
fields.helpText: When this article was or will be published. Used for sorting and display

fields.name: Author Name
fields.helpText: Article author's name. Displayed as byline (e.g., 'by Jane Smith')

fields.name: Hero Banner

validations.message: Must link to a Hero Banner entry

fields.helpText: Optional hero section at top of article. If omitted, uses thumbnail image instead

fields.name: Article Body

validations.message: Use H2-H4 for structure. Embed images and components as needed

fields.helpText: Main article content. Use headings (H2-H4) to structure, embed images, and add formatting

fields.name: Featured Image

validations.message: Image should be at least 800x600px for quality display

fields.helpText: Thumbnail for blog listings and social shares. Recommended: 1200x630px for optimal social media display
